title: Raising Independent Kids
itunes:author: Featured Guests: Michael Anderson & Dr. Timothy Johanson
itunes:summary:
You kids may just be more capable than you think! John and Danny discuss how parents can fight the urge to be controlling.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "GIST: The Essence of Raising Life-Ready Kids" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-04-06?refcd=1076101

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/raising-independent-kids/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
